title: The English lovers, or, A girle worth gold both parts, so often acted with general applause, now newly formed into a romance / by the accurate pen of I.D., Gent.
author: Dauncey, John, fl. 1663.
notes: A novelization of T. Heywood's The fair maid of the west.
In 2 parts; pt. 2 has special t.p.: The English lovers, a romance. London : 1661.
Reproduction of original in Newberry Library.
